name: 2024 The 4th International Conference on Big Data and Computational Intelligence
content: Publication and Indexing: All the papers will be peer reviewed by experts. The review result comes out in 15 to 20 days. Accepted and presented papers will be published by ACM Conference Proceedings, indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, ISTP/CPCI and other academical databases. Conference proceedings have been successfuly indexed by EI Compendex and SCOPUS within two months after online.
